name: cronicle
description: Cronicle is a self-hosted distributed task scheduler with a web-based GUI for managing jobs across multiple servers. It supports load balancing, per-job permissions, job history, plugins, and notifications.
features: Distributed Scheduling: Run jobs across multiple servers seamlessly. Scale your automation.
Load Balancing: Automatically distribute tasks for optimal performance. Efficient resource usage.
Web-Based GUI: Manage all jobs through intuitive interface. No SSH required.
Job Permissions: Fine-grained access control per task. Secure team collaboration.
Plugin System: Extend functionality with custom plugins. Adapt to your needs.
Notification Support: Alerts via email, Slack, and webhooks. Stay informed everywhere.
